website_summaries.verdict: High (13.5" from arch) leather upper women's Eskiva winter boot, comes in gray or burgundy ("winetasting").
pros: For those more fashion- than boxing-minded, these Eskiva boots come from a popular manufacturer with a reputation for quality
Genuine leather upper and rubber sole
They go on and off easily, with both a side zipper and front lacing
Most buyers love these boots, especially in the burgundy color
cons: The calf of these boots was too narrow in circumference for some women, so the thickness of an individual's calf should be considered before buying

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker Hi!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Eskiva Very Hi! The winetasting color is just as it appears, very deep and rich. The shoe is true to size, but just like the regular eskiva they are made a little narrow. Also, my calves are 15inches and they fit comfortably but snug. Can't wait to get more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Dstill

customer_reviews.title: They fit great. Make sure to order a size above your normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: (update, only after about a month and a half the little rubber rings for the laces around the ankle busted they're thin and get brittle) order a size above what you wear. They do take a long time to put on and off but that is the only downfall. I know they make boxing shoes that have a side zipper but they are just a little bit more expensive so if you're looking to save a couple bucks and get a great pair of boxing shoes these are it
customer_reviews.author: Female Mixed Martial Artist

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I got them because they reminded me of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I got them because they reminded me of the Puma Berlin which is no longer available. Even though they lace up, they have a side zip that makes them easy to put on. My calves are a little big so it also helps being able to loosen the laces a bit for fit. I plan on buying them again in a different color. The burgundy is awesome, though.
customer_reviews.author: Xenobia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what you see in the picture. They fit perfect. I'm a size 9 and that's what I bought. I like them so much I'm going to buy the black ones. They look great in the gym. Perfect for working out in. They did come in an unofficial brown plain box but they still look awesome. The only negative is since their white I already got them dirty. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Angela Salvagno

customer_reviews.title: The boots ate fabulous. Very well made. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots ate fabulous. Very well made. The only thing is I am 8.5 but they were tight on me may be because I have big legs. They might fit differently on different people. Worth having though.
customer_reviews.author: SAM I AM

customer_reviews.title: wonderful boots. ok for fall
customer_reviews.text: wonderful boots. ok for fall. have not worn them in water/rain/snow yet. but i did take the time to spray with some waterproofing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Alright just size up
customer_reviews.text: The black around the sides liked green and did not fit me well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them to work out in and also ride my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them to work out in and also ride my bike. I noticed when I wear them I feel eyes looking and next I hear where did you get thoughs?
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable that I purchased them in white too!
customer_reviews.author: DMMg

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, order half size down.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Puma athletic shoes for years, and have always worn a 7.5, but I ended up needing the size 7 in these. Love the boots once I found the pair that fits!
customer_reviews.author: SwedishFishTacos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected and I love them. I would love like to have the grey ones also
customer_reviews.author: stephanie n.

customer_reviews.title: and my wife loved them! I was scared at first because I ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift, and my wife loved them! I was scared at first because I thought they looked purple (color she hates) but she’s convinced they are maroon!!!! So hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: They look good tho'.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come in a Puma original box...... Kinda Shady, don't know about the authenticity. They look good tho'.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I rated it a 5/5 SARS because it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the old leather boots with buckles that you sold
customer_reviews.text: I love the old leather boots with buckles that you sold. These were to big in the heal and to small on top. I was really disappointed and still love my old Puma boots. Bring back those and I will buy them for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Palmer

customer_reviews.title: PUMA Women's Eskiva Very HI Wn's Boxing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I received the black pair today in a 61/2 which is my size but without loosening p the shoelaces these would not fit around my calves. I am going to take the laces completely out and thread them a different way and see if they are any better and if not I may have to send these back. I like them but they need to be made bigger around the calf area. Hopefully, I don't have to send them back because I do like them but for $120 dollars I have to be able to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: sharon sellers milazzo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute boots
customer_reviews.text: tighter around the calf than expected, but able to loosen with the laces. The rest of the shoe fits as expected. The laces are real all the way down...this is awesome because you can make them as tight or loose as you want, but a little annoying because teh tongue of the boot is the entire length of the boot and sometimes shifts or wrinkles and can become irritating. They are fashionable though. So, you do not expect them to be super comfortable hiking boots. They are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sneakers I luv them so much true to size about to buy them in black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Eskiva Very HI Wn's Boxing Shoe
product_meta.description:
The eskiva collection by puma is a revolutionary line in the sport designs category. Featuring a rich leather upper, the eskiva very hi wn's boot is for ladies who want to rock the eskiva with attitude. With its high boot design crafted for winter, the eskiva very hi wn's oozes character.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
